mapper.insert: SELECT TTY_SYS_DICS_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL INSERT INTO tty_sys_dics(id,code,dic_type,value,parent_id,parent_type,use_flag,type_flag,dic_flag,default_value,order_flag,delete_flag) VALUES (#{id},#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dicType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{parentId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{parentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{useFlag,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{typeFlag,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{dicFlag,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{defaultValue,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{orderFlag,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{deleteFlag,jdbcType=NUMERIC})
mapper.update:
UPDATE tty_sys_dics
code = #{code},
dic_type = #{dicType},
value = #{value},
parent_id = #{parentId},
parent_type = #{parentType},
use_flag = #{useFlag},
type_flag = #{typeFlag},
dic_flag = #{dicFlag},
default_value = #{defaultValue},
order_flag = #{orderFlag},
where id = #{id} or (code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=NUMERIC})
